Package oh_hecc.game_parts.component_editing_windows

package oh_hecc.game_parts.component_editing_windows
These classes are here as a GUI to edit individual EditablePassage/EditableMetadata objects.
Author:
Rachel Lowe
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    EditorWindowInterface
    Lighterweight interface for GenericEditorWindow, for purposes of passing it to the main program
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    GenericEditorWindow
    A superclass for both of the editor window classes (because they both use all these things)
    MetadataEditorWindow
    Basically this class is a dialog window to be used for editing EditableMetadata objects (or, well, MetadataEditingInterface instances.
    PassageEditorWindow
    A class that basically is a window that allows a user to edit an EditablePassage (and indirectly edit the other passages it's linked to)
